create_account.title: Create Account
create_account.security_notice: This password is only valid on this device for payments and unlocking. As it is encrypted locally, it cannot be reset if lost. Please keep it secure.
create_account.errors_wallet_gen_failed: Failed to create wallet. Please try again later.
create_account.errors_mnemonic_empty: We couldn't create your security phrase. Please check your device space and try again
